programme.desc: Paper 1: Section B on Argumentative Essay. Introduces mechanics of writing a free essay, includs a check list of do's and don't's. Provides interpretation and analysis of question and sample answer.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep06
programme.desc: Paper 2: Section C: Comprehension. Helps students identify important points in the question and how/ where to find the answer. Also focuses on how to write a response using own words.
